All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdvanceAttack
Represents an advance attack order, which is a type of advance order where the attacking player attempts to conquer an enemy territory.
AdvanceMove
Represents an advance move order, which moves armies from one territory to an adjacent territory.
AdvanceOrder
Abstract class representing an advance order in the game.
AggressivePlayer
Represents a player in the game who owns territories and can issue orders.
AirliftAttack
Represents an airlift attack order, which is a specialized form of airlift order where the attacking player attempts to capture an enemy territory using airlifted armies.
AirliftMove
Represents an airlift move order, which moves armies from one territory to another using airlift mechanics.
AirliftOrder
Abstract class representing an airlift order in the game.
BenevolentPlayer
Represents a Benevolent player in the game who owns territories and can issue orders.
BlockadeOrder
Represents a blockade order in the game.
BombOrder
Represents a bomb order in the game.
CardType
Represents the different types of cards available in the game.
CheaterPlayer
Represents a Cheater player in the game who owns territories and can issue orders.
Command
Interface representing a command in the Command pattern.
CommandPromptView
Handles user input through the command line.
CommandValidator
Utility class for command validation.
DeployCommand
Represents a deploy command in the Command pattern.
DeployOrder
Represents a deploy order where a player deploys armies to a target territory.
FileLogObserver
FileLogObserver class implements the LogObserver interface.
GameController
Main controller class that coordinates the game flow.
GameEngineDriver
The entry point for the Warzone game application.
GameLogger
GameLogger class serves as a facade for the logging system.
GamePlayController
Controller class responsible for handling gameplay operations.
GameView
Responsible for displaying game information to the user.
HelpDocumentation
Provides help documentation for the game commands.
HumanPlayer
Represents a player in the game who owns territories and can issue orders.
IssueOrderPhase
Represents the Issue Order phase of the game.
LogEntryBuffer
LogEntryBuffer class acts as the Observable in the Observer pattern.
LogObserver
Observer interface for the Observer pattern implementation.
Map
Represents a game map consisting of territories and continents.
MapEditorController
Controller class responsible for handling map editing operations.
MapEditorPhase
Represents the Map Editor phase of the game.
MapLoader
Loads a game map from a file.
NegotiateOrder
Represents a negotiate order in the game.
Order
Abstract class representing an order in the game, implementing the Command pattern.
OrderExecutionPhase
Represents the Order Execution phase of the game.
Phase
Abstract class representing a game phase in the State pattern.
PhaseType
Enum representing the different phases of the game.
Player
Represents a player in the game who owns territories and can issue orders.
RandomPlayer
Represents a Random in the game who owns territories and can issue orders.
SingleGameMode
Represents a single game mode in the Warzone game.
SingleGameScenarioGenerator
Utility class for generating random game scenarios in Single Game Mode.
SingleGameUtil
Utility class for Single Game Mode operations.
SingleGameValidator
Utility class for validating single game mode configuration.
StartupPhase
Represents the Startup phase of the game.
Territory
Represents a territory in the game.
TournamentMode
Represents a tournament mode for the Warzone game.
TournamentUtil
Utility class for tournament-related operations.
